pageContext.claim: “We have also taken bold action to reduce the price of prescription drugs.....I want to thank Pfizer, Novartis, and others. We called them. We said you got to reduce the price of your drugs, and they did. They didn't do the increase. So we want to thank them. But prices are coming down now for prescription drugs.”
pageContext.analysis: Pfizer did agree to a brief pause but then announced it would raise prices on 41 prescription drugs as planned at the start of 2019. Prices did not come down.
